widget.convert: { "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (810, 30), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 30), size = (790, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (760, 1), size = (48, 48), flags = BT_SCALE, png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap # MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (5, 50), size = (610, 2), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [parseFont("MenuFont;24"), parseFont("MenuFont;15")], "itemHeight": 50 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 0), size = (740, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 25), size = (720, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1, color = "TextIndented", color_sel = "TextIndentedSelected"), # index 1 is the state MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (20, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 2), # index 2 is the status pixmap # MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (0, 49), size = (550, 2), png = 3), # index 3 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [parseFont("Regular;22"), parseFont("Regular;18")], "itemHeight": 50 }
